just make the second one this

case 299: if ((objectX == 3249 && objectY == 3432 && actionTimer == 0) || (objectX == 3250 && objectY == 3431) && actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You get defense xp!"); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[1]), 1); actionTimer = 60; } else { sendMessage("Wait"); } break;

thanks ownage can i get codes for these?

case 823: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You hit the dummy and get attack xp!"); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[0]), 0); actionTimer = 60; } break;

and

case 299: if ((objectX == 3249 && objectY == 3432) || (objectX == 3250 && objectY == 3431) && actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You get defense xp!"); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[1]), 1); actionTimer = 60; } else { sendMessage("Wait"); } break;

item.title: Massing dummy room
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

case 1531: if ((objectX == 3253 && objectY == 3431) && actionTimer == 0 || (objectX == 3249 && objectY == 3435) && actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You hit the door and get strength xp!"); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[2]), 2); actionTimer = 60; } else { sendMessage("WAIT"); } break;

that or …

case 1531: if ((objectX == 3253 && objectY == 3431) && actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You hit the door and get strength xp!"); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[2]), 2); actionTimer = 60; } else if ((objectX == 3249 && objectY == 3435) && actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You hit the door and get strength xp!"); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[2]), 2); actionTimer = 60; } else { sendMessage("WAIT"); } break;

enjoy …

item.title: Massing dummy room
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

ok i made the action timer 60 for all the training objects, but for half of the objects you cant mass, but the other objects you can mass… like there is one door you cant mass on it go to the other door you can mass…

heres what i put, did i do anything wrong/

case 1531: if ((objectX == 3253 && objectY == 3431) || (objectX == 3249 && objectY == 3435) && actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You hit the door and get strength xp!"); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[2]), 2); actionTimer = 60; } else { sendMessage("WAIT"); } break;
